articles.description: In about a month, some of the world's best filmmakers will descend on the "City of Canals" for the 79th Venice Film Festival. Notable films include opening night film, Noah Baumbach's "White Noise," "Blonde" and Olivia Wilde's "Don't Worry Darling."
articles.content:
In about a month, some of the worlds best filmmakers will descend on the City of Canals for the 79th Venice International Film Festival.

articles.title: Lil Nas X, Jack Harlow & Kendrick Lamar Lead 2022 MTV VMA Nominations: Full List - Billboard
articles.description: Doja Cat and Harry Styles are a beat behind with six nods each.
